tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
tokens.translation: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
tokens.translation: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute

tokens.resolved_gloss: a contrivance, i.e. (concretely) a texture, machine, or (abstractly) intention, plan (whether bad, a plot; or good, advice)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application

tokens.resolved_gloss: gold, figuratively, something gold-colored (i.e. yellow), as oil, a clear sky

tokens.resolved_gloss: silver (from its pale color); by implication, money

tokens.resolved_gloss: copper, hence, something made of that metal, i.e. coin, a fetter; figuratively, base (as compared with gold or silver)
